title: Days Supply
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "daysSupply" )

title: Days Supply
text: shows days supply drug records summarised ingredient level.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugDaysSupply,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Days Supply
text: shows days supply drug concept level. tables identical overall just including two columns beginning.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugDaysSupplyByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Diagnostics Summary
text: diagnosticsSummary summarises diagnostics results package. complete diagnostics Summary checks “missing”, “exposureDuration”, “type”, “route”, “dose” “quantity” needed. make individual components diagnostic Summary. fewer checks run, diagnostics Summary contain fewer components. Let’s look diagnostics summary
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(DT) library(dplyr)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = c("missing", "exposureDuration", "type", "route", "dose", "quantity", "diagnosticsSummary") ) datatable(acetaminophen_checks$diagnosticsSummary,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Drug Dose
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "dose" )

title: Drug Dose
text: drug dose check output “overall”. Yet contains strata unit, unit route, unit route pattern_id. pattern refers rows drug_strength table. drug strength table around 120 different patterns. Yet around 40 make sense clinically. dose estimated pre-specified drug strength patterns. know level detail, variable called pattern name (explanation variable). output drug dose check “summarised result”. information can found : https://darwin-eu-dev.github.io/omopgenerics/articles/a04_summarised_result.html result “summarised result” use function dailyDoseCoverage() DrugUtilisation R Package. https://darwin-eu-dev.github.io/DrugUtilisation/reference/dailyDoseCoverage.html
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugDose,   rownames = FALSE )

title: DrugDuration
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "exposureDuration" )

title: DrugDuration
text: shows drug exposure duration drug records summarised ingredient level. drug exposure duration estimated (drug_exposure_end_date - drug_exposure_start_date + 1) every individual drug exposure record.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugExposureDurationOverall,   rownames = FALSE )

what: Drug exposure duration by drug concept
title: DrugDuration
text: shows drug exposure duration drug concept level. drug exposure duration estimated (drug_exposure_end_date - drug_exposure_start_date + 1) every individual drug exposure record. tables identical overall just including two columns beginning.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugExposureDurationByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Drug Sig
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "sig" )

title: Drug Sig
text: shows sig(netur) drug records summarised ingredient level. signetur prescription contains information , often, much drug patient shall use.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugSig,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Drug Sig
text: shows sig(netur) drug concept level. signetur prescription contains information , often, much drug patient shall use. tables identical overall just including two columns beginning.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugSigByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Drug Source Concepts
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "sourceConcept" )

title: Drug Source Concepts
text: shows drug source concepts next mapped drug concepts. check exists “byConcept” depict required detail. get confused name object “Overall”.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugSourceConceptsOverall,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Drug Types
text: name drug type may misleading. refers whether drugs records prescriptions claims similar. whole list drug types can seen athena. https://athena.ohdsi.org/search-terms/terms?conceptClass=Drug+Type&invalidReason=Valid&page=1&pageSize=15&query=&boosts
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "type" )

title: Drug Types
text: shows drug type drug records summarised ingredient level.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugTypesOverall,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Drug Types
text: shows drug type drug records drug concept level. tables identical overall just including two columns beginning.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugTypesByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Introduction To DrugExposureDiagnostics
text: DrugExposureDiagnostics package, diagnostics conducted ingredient level, requested, additionally drug level. use ingredient “acetaminophen” example. brief look ingredient.

title: Introduction To DrugExposureDiagnostics
text: can run available checks time using ´executeChecks()´ function. return list contains results check. Multiple ingredients can added vector ´ingredients´ cdm database reference OMOP CDM using CDMConnector package. ingredients list ingredients interests, default 1125315 acetaminophen. subsetToConceptId vector concept IDs ingredients filter. concept ID positive included, negative one excluded. NULL, concept IDs ingredient considered. checks allows select checks executed, default missing values, exposure duration quantity checks run. minCellCount minimum number events report, numbers lower obscured. sample number samples, default, 10.000 drug record samples used. tablePrefix optional value database tables created executeChecks. earliestStartDate earliest data drug records included. verbose parameter enables printing messages console. byConcept boolean determines overall results returned also drug concept. check “missing” outputs missingValuesOverall byConcept = FALSE additionally missingValuesbyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “exposureDuration” outputs drugExposureDurationOverall byConcept = FALSE additionally drugExposureDurationbyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “type” outputs drugTypesOverall byConcept = FALSE additionally drugTypesbyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “route” outputs drugRoutesOverall byConcept = FALSE additionally drugRoutesbyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “sourceConcept” outputs sourceConceptsOverall (actually drug concept level. disregards byConcept argument drug concept level makes sense ) check “daysSupply” outputs drugDaysSupplyOverall byConcept = FALSE additionally drugDaysSupplybyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “verbatimEndDate” outputs drugVerbatimEndDate byConcept = FALSE additionally drugVerbatimEndDatebyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “dose” outputs drugDoseOverall (output ingredient level. disregards byConcept argument drug concept level makes sense ) check “sig” outputs drugSig byConcept = FALSE additionally drugSigbyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “quantity” outputs drugQuantity byConcept = FALSE additionally drugQuantitybyConcept byConcept = TRUE check “diagnosticsSummary” outputs summary called diagnosticsSummary , see files created:
code: all_checks <- executeChecks(cdm,   ingredients = c(1125315),   subsetToConceptId = NULL,   checks = c(     "missing", "exposureDuration", "type", "route", "sourceConcept", "daysSupply",     "verbatimEndDate", "dose", "sig", "quantity", "diagnosticsSummary"   ),   minCellCount = 5,   sample = 10000,   tablePrefix = NULL,   earliestStartDate = "2010-01-01",   verbose = FALSE,   byConcept = TRUE ) #> population after earliestStartDate smaller than sample, sampling ignored #> ℹ The following estimates will be computed: #> • daily_dose: count_missing, percentage_missing, mean, sd, q05, q25, median, #>   q75, q95, min, max #> ! Table is collected to memory as not all requested estimates are supported on #>   the database side #> → Start summary of data, at 2024-11-22 18:48:39.294191 #>  #> ✔ Summary finished, at 2024-11-22 18:48:39.59653 names(all_checks) #>  [1] "conceptSummary"                "missingValuesOverall"          #>  [3] "missingValuesByConcept"        "drugExposureDurationOverall"   #>  [5] "drugExposureDurationByConcept" "drugTypesOverall"              #>  [7] "drugTypesByConcept"            "drugRoutesOverall"             #>  [9] "drugRoutesByConcept"           "drugSourceConceptsOverall"     #> [11] "drugDaysSupply"                "drugDaysSupplyByConcept"       #> [13] "drugVerbatimEndDate"           "drugVerbatimEndDateByConcept"  #> [15] "drugDose"                      "drugSig"                       #> [17] "drugSigByConcept"              "drugQuantity"                  #> [19] "drugQuantityByConcept"         "diagnosticsSummary"            #> [21] "metadata"

title: Introduction To DrugExposureDiagnostics
text: first item shown, conceptSummary output check always output. table used within function input requested checks. contains information CONCEPT table DRUG_STRENGTH table. conceptSummary several use: can quickly seen whether certain drug mapped ingredient level. Thereby, drug_concept_id ingredient_concept_id identical. Furthermore, conceptSummary can used make decisions refine concept list. example, though argument subsetToConceptId executeChecks() function, selected concepts can requested eliminated. conceptSummary case acetaminophen subsetToConceptId = NULL, following drug concepts part diagnostics investigation.
code: datatable(all_checks$conceptSummary,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Introduction To DrugExposureDiagnostics
text: running checks, can write created outputs (CSV files) zip file disk using writeResultToDisk() function. zip created using writeResultToDisk() function serves input corresponding Shiny Application. Please replace “your_database” name database. Create designated “output_folder” desired location put path working directory.
code: writeResultToDisk(all_checks,   databaseId = "your_database",   outputFolder = "output_folder" )

what: View results in the Shiny app & make it available for publishing
title: Introduction To DrugExposureDiagnostics
code: viewResults(   dataFolder = file.path(getwd(), "output_folder"),   makePublishable = TRUE,   publishDir = file.path(getwd(), "MyStudyResultsExplorer"),   overwritePublishDir = TRUE )

title: Missingness
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "missing" )

title: Missingness
text: shows missingness drug records summarised ingredient level.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$missingValuesOverall,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Missingness
text: shows missingness drug concept level.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$missingValuesByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Quantity
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "quantity" )

title: Quantity
text: shows quantity drug records summarised ingredient level. quantity required field, useful field. quantity filled depends drug strength pattern. quantified drugs (denominator_value missing), quantity identifies number packages / items (case multiple dose packages). However, case non-quantified drugs (denominator_value missing), quantity identifies volume / total number actuations others dispensed / prescribed.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugQuantity,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Quantity
text: shows quantity drug records drug concept level. quantity required field, useful field. quantity filled depends drug strength pattern. quantified drugs (denominator_value missing), quantity identifies number packages / items (case multiple dose packages). However, case non-quantified drugs (denominator_value missing), quantity identifies volume / total number actuations others dispensed / prescribed. tables identical overall just including two columns beginning.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugQuantityByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Routes
text: possible routes can seen athena. https://athena.ohdsi.org/search-terms/terms?vocabulary=SNOMED&invalidReason=Valid&domain=Route&page=1&pageSize=15&query=
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "route" )

title: Routes
text: shows routes drug records summarised ingredient level.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugRoutesOverall,   rownames = FALSE )

title: Routes
text: shows route drug records drug concept level. tables identical overall just including two columns beginning.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugRoutesByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

what: Run the Verbatim End Date check
title: Verbatim End Date
text: verbatim end date drug exposure end date source data. Thus, check whether verbatim end date equals drug_exposure_end_date OMOP (required field).
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr) library(DT)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- mockDrugExposure() acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = acetaminophen,   checks = "verbatimEndDate" )

title: Verbatim End Date
text: shows days drug verbatim end date checks summarised ingredient level.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugVerbatimEndDate,   rownames = FALSE )

what: Drug verbatim end date by concept
title: Verbatim End Date
text: shows days drug verbatim end date checks drug concept level. tables identical overall just including two columns beginning.
code: datatable(acetaminophen_checks$drugVerbatimEndDateByConcept,   rownames = FALSE )

code: @Manual{,   title = {DrugExposureDiagnostics: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records},   author = {Ger Inberg and Edward Burn and Theresa Burkard},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.0.10, https://github.com/darwin-eu/DrugExposureDiagnostics},   url = {https://darwin-eu.github.io/DrugExposureDiagnostics/}, }

what: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
text: goal DrugExposureDiagnostics summarise ingredient specific drug exposure data OMOP CDM.

title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
text: can install DrugExposureDiagnostics CRAN like : install development version:
code: install.packages("DrugExposureDiagnostics") install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("darwin-eu/DrugExposureDiagnostics")

title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
code: citation("DrugExposureDiagnostics") #> Warning in citation("DrugExposureDiagnostics"): could not determine year for #> 'DrugExposureDiagnostics' from package DESCRIPTION file #> To cite package 'DrugExposureDiagnostics' in publications use: #>  #>   Inberg G, Burn E, Burkard T (????). _DrugExposureDiagnostics: #>   Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records_. R package #>   version 1.0.10, https://github.com/darwin-eu/DrugExposureDiagnostics, #>   <https://darwin-eu.github.io/DrugExposureDiagnostics/>. #>  #> A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is #>  #>   @Manual{, #>     title = {DrugExposureDiagnostics: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records}, #>     author = {Ger Inberg and Edward Burn and Theresa Burkard}, #>     note = {R package version 1.0.10, https://github.com/darwin-eu/DrugExposureDiagnostics}, #>     url = {https://darwin-eu.github.io/DrugExposureDiagnostics/}, #>   }

title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
text: Let´s look ingredient acetaminophen (https://athena.ohdsi.org/search-terms/terms/1125315). can run checks available ´DrugExposureDiagnostics´ using ´executeChecks´ function. output list contains following set tibbles: first item contains information concept ids used database given ingredient. tibbles contain information various checks performed. example, can see summary missingness ingredient-related records drug exposure table, overall concept. can also see summary drug exposure duration (drug_exposure_end_date - drug_exposure_end_date + 1), overall concept. information checks performed please see package vignettes. running checks can write CSVs disk using writeResultToDisk function.
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(CDMConnector) library(dplyr) cdm <- mockDrugExposure() #> Note: method with signature 'DBIConnection#Id' chosen for function 'dbExistsTable', #>  target signature 'duckdb_connection#Id'. #>  "duckdb_connection#ANY" would also be valid #> Warning: ! 1 column in vocabulary do not match expected column type: #> • `vocabulary_concept_id` is numeric but expected integer #> Warning: ! 1 column in drug_strength do not match expected column type: #> • `box_size` is numeric but expected integer all_checks <- executeChecks(   cdm = cdm,   ingredients = 1125315,   checks = c(     "missing", "exposureDuration", "type", "route", "sourceConcept", "daysSupply",     "verbatimEndDate", "dose", "sig", "quantity", "diagnosticsSummary"   ) ) #> population after earliestStartDate smaller than sample, sampling ignored #> ℹ The following estimates will be computed: #> • daily_dose: count_missing, percentage_missing, mean, sd, q05, q25, median, #>   q75, q95, min, max #> ! Table is collected to memory as not all requested estimates are supported on #>   the database side #> → Start summary of data, at 2024-11-22 17:54:36.629726 #>  #> ✔ Summary finished, at 2024-11-22 17:54:36.777694 names(all_checks) #>  [1] "conceptSummary"                "missingValuesOverall"          #>  [3] "missingValuesByConcept"        "drugExposureDurationOverall"   #>  [5] "drugExposureDurationByConcept" "drugTypesOverall"              #>  [7] "drugTypesByConcept"            "drugRoutesOverall"             #>  [9] "drugRoutesByConcept"           "drugSourceConceptsOverall"     #> [11] "drugDaysSupply"                "drugDaysSupplyByConcept"       #> [13] "drugVerbatimEndDate"           "drugVerbatimEndDateByConcept"  #> [15] "drugDose"                      "drugSig"                       #> [17] "drugSigByConcept"              "drugQuantity"                  #> [19] "drugQuantityByConcept"         "diagnosticsSummary"            #> [21] "metadata" glimpse(all_checks$conceptSummary) #> Rows: 6 #> Columns: 26 #> Rowwise:  #> $ drug_concept_id             <int> 40229134, 1127078, 1127433, 40162522, 1913… #> $ drug                        <chr> "acetaminophen 21.7 MG/ML / Dextromethorph… #> $ ingredient_concept_id       <int> 1125315, 1125315, 1125315, 1125315, 112531… #> $ ingredient                  <chr> "acetaminophen", "acetaminophen", "acetami… #> $ n_records                   <int> 12, 19, 13, 18, 14, 10 #> $ n_patients                  <int> 11, 13, 11, 15, 13, 9 #> $ domain_id                   <chr> "Drug", "Drug", "Drug", "Drug", "Drug", "D… #> $ vocabulary_id               <chr> "RxNorm", "RxNorm", "RxNorm", "RxNorm", "R… #> $ concept_class_id            <chr> "Clinical Drug", "Clinical Drug", "Clinica… #> $ standard_concept            <chr> "S", "S", "S", "S", "S", "S" #> $ concept_code                <chr> "1043400", "833036", "1049221", "313782", … #> $ valid_start_date            <date> 1970-01-01, 1970-01-01, 1970-01-01, 1970-0… #> $ valid_end_date              <date> 2099-12-31, 2099-12-31, 2099-12-31, 2099-1… #> $ invalid_reason              <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA #> $ amount_value                <dbl> 300, 100, NA, 100, 300, 200 #> $ amount_unit_concept_id      <int> 9655, 9655, NA, 9655, 9655, 9655 #> $ numerator_value             <dbl> NA, NA, 2, NA, NA, NA #> $ numerator_unit_concept_id   <int> NA, NA, 8587, NA, NA, NA #> $ numerator_unit              <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA #> $ denominator_value           <dbl> NA, NA, 10, NA, NA, NA #> $ denominator_unit_concept_id <int> NA, NA, 8587, NA, NA, NA #> $ denominator_unit            <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA #> $ box_size                    <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ amount_unit                 <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA #> $ dose_form                   <chr> "Oral Tablet", "Oral Tablet", "Oral Tablet… #> $ result_obscured             <lgl> FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE all_checks$conceptSummary %>%   select("drug_concept_id", "drug") #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #> # Rowwise:  #>   drug_concept_id drug                                           #>             <int> <chr>                                          #> 1        40229134 acetaminophen 21.7 MG/ML / Dextromethorphan    #> 2         1127078 acetaminophen 750 MG / Hydrocodone Bitartrate  #> 3         1127433 acetaminophen 325 MG / Oxycodone Hydrochloride #> 4        40162522 acetaminophen 325 MG Oral Tablet               #> 5        19133768 acetaminophen 160 MG Oral Tablet               #> 6        40231925 acetaminophen 325 MG / Hydrocodone Bitartrate all_checks$missingValuesOverall #> # A tibble: 15 × 10 #> # Rowwise:  ingredient_concept_id, ingredient #>    ingredient_concept_id ingredient    variable      n_records n_sample n_person #>                    <int> <chr>         <chr>             <int>    <dbl>    <dbl> #>  1               1125315 acetaminophen n_missing_dr…        44    10000       25 #>  2               1125315 acetaminophen n_missing_pe…        44    10000       25 #>  3               1125315 acetaminophen n_missing_dr…        44    10000       25 #>  4 Zip files containing results multiple databases can placed folder. makePublishable (Optional) copy data files make app publishable posit connect/shinyapp.io publishDir make publishable true - directory shiny app copied overwritePublishDir (Optional) make publishable true - overwrite directory publishing launch.browser app launched default browser, Shiny window.
